page.title: 14RECREATION IN NEWARK
page.content: Recreation is important in the Newark area.Here are some examples:-cricket, rugby,river cruising,circus,fair, fishing,walking,gardening,televison viewing,reading,yachting,canoeing and cycling. One of the favourite pastimes of Newark is river cruising.People also use canoes on the river frequently. Yachting is popular and takes place on a lake near the Yacht Club.Cricket is also important in an area that supports two clubs.There are many rugby enthusiasts in Newark who support a large club. There is a strong need for recreation even though there is little unemployment in this area.People need to relax in an era of high speed living.Therefore it is essential to have a variety of recreational activities.
